mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_org_comment( id, orgid, userid, content, imageurl, statute, grade, commentdate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgid}, #{userid}, #{content}, #{imageurl}, #{statute}, #{grade}, #{commentdate} )
